targets.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "sql_version" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

SELECT mean("Percent_Processor_Time") AS "Avg. Total %", mean("Percent_User_Time") AS "Avg. User %",mean("Percent_Privileged_Time") AS "Avg. Priv. %" FROM "sql_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^(?i)$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"

SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "Avg. % User", mean("usage_system") AS "Avg. % System", mean("usage_iowait") AS "Avg. % IO Wait", mean("usage_steal") AS "Avg. % Steal"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^(?i)$Host.*$/AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT mean("Query_Store_CPU_Usage") AS "cpu %" FROM "sql_qs" WHERE "host" =~ /^(?i)$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance"
SELECT mean("Query_Store_logical_reads") AS "log. reads" FROM "sql_qs" WHERE "host" =~ /^(?i)$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance"
SELECT mean("Query_Store_logical_writes") FROM "sql_qs" WHERE "host" =~ /^(?i)$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance"
SELECT mean("Query_Store_physical_reads") FROM "sql_qs" WHERE "host" =~ /^(?i)$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE (("counter" = 'Transactions/sec' AND "instance" =~ /^Total/ ) OR ("counter" = 'Write Transactions/sec' AND "instance" =~ /^Total/ ) OR ("counter" = 'XTP Memory Used (KB)' AND "instance" =~ /^Total/ )OR "counter" = 'SQL Re-Compilations/sec' OR "counter" = 'SQL Compilations/sec' OR "counter" = 'Batch Requests/sec' ) AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "counter"

SELECT max("value") FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'Processes blocked' OR "counter" = 'User Connections')  AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "counter" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("value")) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE "counter" = 'Number of Deadlocks/sec'  AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "counter"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "counter" = 'Lock Timeouts/sec') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

links.title: Wait Stats by Category by Instance

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("wait_time_ms"), $__interval) FROM "sqlserver_waitstats" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "wait_type" != 'VDI_CLIENT_OTHER' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "wait_category", "server"

SELECT "value" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$Instance$/ AND ( "counter" = 'Page life expectancy' OR "counter" = 'Page reads/sec' OR "counter" = 'Page writes/sec' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server", "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND ( "counter" = 'Page writes/sec' OR "counter" = 'Page reads/sec' OR "counter" = 'Lazy writes/sec' or "counter" = 'Buffer cache hit ratio' OR "counter" = 'Checkpoint pages/sec' OR "counter" = 'Page lookups/sec' OR "counter" = 'Readahead pages/sec') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT mean("value") FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND ( "counter" = 'Free Space in tempdb (KB)' OR "counter" = 'Version Store Size (KB)' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server", "counter", time($interval)

panels.description: Temp table and table variable statistics.

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'Active Temp Tables' OR "counter" = 'Temp Tables For Destruction') AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server", "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'Temp Tables Creation Rate') AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Temp Tables

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("Avg._Disk_sec/Read", $__interval) FROM "sql_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /(?i)^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter  AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume1' AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume2'  GROUP BY "instance"

SELECT (last("read_time") / last("reads")) AS "Read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^(?i)$Host.*$/) AND $timeFilter  AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume1' AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume2'  GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("Avg._Disk_sec/Write", $__interval) FROM "sql_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /(?i)^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter  AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume1' AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume2'  GROUP BY "instance"

SELECT (last("write_time") / last("writes")) AS "Writes" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^(?i)$Host.*$/) AND $timeFilter  AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume1' AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume2'  GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("Free_Megabytes") FROM "sql_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /(?i)^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter  AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume1' AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume2' AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume12'  GROUP BY time($interval), "instance"

SELECT mean("free") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host.*$/) AND $timeFilter  AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume1' AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume2' AND "instance" != 'HarddiskVolume12'  GROUP BY time($interval), "host"

SELECT last("value") AS "Data Size" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE "counter" = 'Data File(s) Size (KB)' AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(null) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) AS "Log Send Queue" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND ( "counter" = 'Log Send Queue' OR "counter" = 'Log Apply Pending Queue' OR "counter" = 'Log Apply Ready Queue') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "counter" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'Transaction Delay' AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "counter" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"),1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND ( "counter" = 'Bytes Sent to Replica/sec' OR "counter" = 'Bytes Sent to Transport/sec' OR "counter" = 'Bytes Received from Replica/sec' OR "counter" = 'Log Bytes Received/sec') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "counter" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "counter" = 'Log Flush Wait Time') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'Log Bytes Flushed/sec' OR "counter" = 'Log Flushes/sec' ) AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE (("counter" = 'Full Scans/sec' OR "counter" = 'Index Searches/sec' OR "counter" = 'Page Splits/sec' or "counter" = 'Forwarded Records/sec')) AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "counter"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'Latch Waits/sec') AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'Memory Grants Pending' OR "counter" = 'Target Server Memory (KB)' OR "counter" = 'Total Server Memory (KB)') AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "counter"

list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES ON telegraf FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY = "host"
